metadata.name: Suspicious Program Location Whitelisted In Firewall Via Netsh.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects Netsh command execution that whitelists a program located in a suspicious location in the Windows Firewall

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\netsh.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('netsh.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('firewall')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('allowedprogram')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('advfirewall')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('firewall')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rule')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('action=allow')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('program=')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\$recycle.bin\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\recycler.bin\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\recyclers.bin\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\systemvolumeinformation\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\default\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\desktop\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\addins\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\cursors\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\debug\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\drivers\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\fonts\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\help\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\tasks\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\tasks\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\downloads\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\local settings\\temporary internet files\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\temporary internet files\\content.outlook\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%public%\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%temp%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%tmp%'))))

output.summary: Detects Netsh command execution that whitelists a program located in a suspicious location in the Windows Firewall
